Nerangs.ab: ąnki. rapīθβən. cūn. ẏaząd. cūn. mibāẏat̰. yastan. psnx́n. ąki. cūn. rōz. ōhrmazd. māh. frauuadīn. ki. dar.āat̰. rapəθβən. mi.bāyat̰. yastan. andar. gāhi. hāuuan. barəsəm. cīδan. yašt. sāxtan. barəsəm. sizdah. tāk. du. tāi. parāgąm. dar. pāi. māh.rōy. nihādan. barasəm. bastan. sāziš. hā.həm. binihāt̰a.

"When someone will perform a rapīθβən, how should he perform it. Answer: When it is the day of Ohrmazd of the month Frauuardīn, in the gāh hāwan he should cut the barsom and prepare the yast. The barsom is of 13 twigs and two fragām. He should place them beside the foot of the māhrōy and tie the barsom. He places as well all implements."
